name: Or Brener
label: Software Engineer
summary: Full Stack Software Developer and Business Systems Analyst with a diverse skill set in backend development, cloud integration, and team collaboration.

work_experience.summary: Contributed to cloud-based system development by building scalable backend services, optimizing integrations, and improving operational efficiency across teams.
highlights: Developed key components for a cloud-based service system by writing a router and Cloud Tasks Client, improving reliability and scalability. Reduced processing time by 30% and increased uptime, boosting cross-team efficiency.
Updated the Shopify-Salesforce integration to route through GCP, streamlining data flow and cutting sync issues by 30%, improving accuracy across 5+ systems.
Transitioned GCP cloud functions to Docker images, improving scalability and deployment speed by 25%, reducing environment-related issues in production.
Created detailed process flow diagrams for team architecture and business operations, reducing onboarding and operational errors by 20%.

work_experience.summary: Supported global infrastructure improvements by optimizing internal tools, automating workflows, and enhancing data accessibility through dashboard migration and API integration.
highlights: Collaborated with the Network Infrastructure team to assess device usability across 30+ international offices, streamlining workflows and improving support reliability.
Led migration of 10+ dashboards from Tableau to Power BI, cutting load times by 60% and enhancing visibility for internal teams.
Developed and deployed a ServiceNow API integrated with TD's device lookup tool, now used daily by 5+ departments, reducing manual queries by 40%.

work_experience.summary: Modernized backend systems for Telus Billing by refactoring legacy code, improving data flows, and ensuring stable deployments through QA and impact assessments.
highlights: Refactored 5,000+ lines of legacy Kotlin code in the Telus Billing System, improving maintainability and reducing technical debt by 30%.

Collaborated with business stakeholders and senior developers to plan, build, and test new billing data flows. Delivered reliable, well-documented billing feeds, improving data accuracy and reporting efficiency.
Led impact assessments and QA testing for backend changes. Ensured stability across deployments, reducing bugs and post-release issues.

work_experience.summary: Migrated mobile features to web using JavaScript, collaborated on feature planning, and ensured quality through testing and QA for improved product stability.
highlights: Migrated key mobile features to web using JavaScript/HTML, expanding platform access for 2M+ monthly users.
Collaborated with product teams to define features based on input from multiple global markets, aligning outcomes with business goals.
Refactored 5,000+ lines of legacy Kotlin code in the Telus Billing System, improving maintainability and reducing technical debt by 30%.
Executed 100+ test cases across unit, sanity, and integration levels using JSON APIs, improving release stability by 35%.
Maintained detailed QA documentation and tracked bugs across Web and Mobile, helping reduce release issues and improving product stability.

work_experience.summary: Supported CS courses through labs, grading, and office hours, and built auto-graders in Java and C to streamline evaluation and enhance student learning.
highlights: Taught and supported 6+ courses including C Programming, Discrete Math, and Web Development, assisting 400+ students.
Conducted labs and held office hours with 30-40 students weekly, improving student understanding and course satisfaction.
Built auto-grader tools in Java and C, reducing grading time by 90% and improving feedback turnaround for 300+ submissions.
Recognized by faculty and students for effective communication and consistent support.

projects.title: Python Chess AI (Variation)
projects.summary: Developed a chess AI using Minimax with Alpha-Beta pruning, tested against 100+ peers.
highlights: Developed a custom Chess variant for AI gameplay using Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning.
Tested AI performance against 105 students' implementations, optimizing heuristics and achieving competitive results.

projects.title: Full Stack Python Online Molecule Viewer
projects.summary: Built a full-stack app to analyze 3D molecules using PostgreSQL, C, Python, and JavaScript.
highlights: Built a full-stack application for inputting, viewing, and analyzing 3D molecular structures.
Utilized PostgreSQL, C, Python, JavaScript, AJAX, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap for seamless front-end and back-end integration.

projects.title: The Impact of Implementing Containerization into CI/CD Testing Pipelines
projects.summary: Researched the benefits and challenges of containerizing CI/CD testing pipelines using Docker and GitHub Actions.
highlights: A research paper that explores the benefits and challenges of containerizing a CI/CD testing pipeline using Docker and GitHub Actions.
